price: 93 en dehors d’Allah ? Peuvent-elles vous secourir ou elles-mêmes se sauver ? »
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
